Class ItemServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • by.chmut.giftit.service.impl.ItemServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ItemService

    public class ItemServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ItemService
    The Item service class implements business logic methods for item entity.

    Sergei Chmut.

                                                       int limit,
                                                       int offset,
                                                       java.lang.String pathForTempFiles)
                                                throws ServiceException
        Find results user's search by the list of item id with limit count on the page. The method returns the most recent data (last added items).
        Specified by:
        findResultsSearchWithLimit in interface ItemService
        Parameters:
        itemId - the item id
        limit - the limit of items
        offset - the offset in results of search
        pathForTempFiles - the path for temp image files
        Returns:
        the list of items
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if find results with limit can't be handled
